title: [K-12] AI-Based Environmental Awareness Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Knowledge and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Project-based learning using AI tools and LMS in a BYOD environment, focusing on creative solutions for environmental challenges.

learning_goals: Students can diagnose local environmental issues and propose data-driven solutions using AI analysis tools
Learners can develop a self-assessment rubric to measure environmental awareness levels during project-based learning
Participants can produce digital content visually representing solutions to environmental problems using AI-generated design tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
